description: Table T(n,k) by antidiagonals of n^k mod k [n,k >= 1].
crossrefs: Rows include A057427, A015910, A056969. Columns include A000004, A000035 (several times), A010872, A010874, A010876, A021559 and other periodic sequences. Diagonals include A000004 and A057427.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 12 2001
